title: Wedding Day Radiance
description: Rani Raw Silk Double Dupatta Lehenga Set: A rich rani-pink silk lehenga with detailed thread and sequin work, paired with a contrasting sheer dupatta that adds a soft, elegant touch.
Oshma Pearl Choker: A vintage-style pearl choker that adds instant bridal elegance.
Jagreethi Necklace Set: Classic gold-and-stone necklace + earrings for a full wedding-ready jewellery stack.
Mirror Bangle Set: Mirror-detailed bangles with mini jhumkis for playful movement and colour.
Davina Polki Ring: A bold polki ring that adds just the right pop of sparkle.
Roisin Heels: Embroidered gold block heels for comfort and glam all through the celebrations.
Rosy Soft Glam: Dewy skin, mauve eyes, and a glossy rose lip to tie the pink tones together.
flatlayAlt: Flat lay of wedding day radiance
modelAlt: Model wearing the wedding day radiance outfit styled from the flat lay
